examples: His number's up this time.
The report includes a number of recommendations.
His confession involved a number of other politicians in the affair.
Thirteen is a prime number.
I had a brush with him a number of years ago.
words.defineEn: a word, sign, or symbol that represents a specific quantity or amount
words.defineVi: một từ, ký hiệu hoặc ký hiệu đại diện cho một số lượng hoặc số lượng cụ thể

examples: The temperature outside is nineteen degrees Celsius.
Katy Jones is nineteen and comes from Birmingham.
My aunt can get talking nineteen to the dozen if you get her on a topic she's passionate about.
Sam came running nineteen to the dozen when he heard his son crying out to him from the back garden.
Nineteen percent say yes.
words.defineEn: the number 19; the number of months in a year and seven months
words.defineVi: số 19; số tháng trong một năm bảy tháng

words.defineEn: describing a quantity that is one more than twenty
words.defineVi: mô tả một số lượng là một hơn hai mươi

words.defineEn: of the number 36; the number of months in three years
words.defineVi: của số 36; số tháng trong ba năm

words.defineEn: of the number 45; the number of degrees for half a right angle
words.defineVi: của số 45; số độ của nửa góc vuông

words.defineEn: the number 91; the number of minutes in a typical soccer game plus one
words.defineVi: con số 91; số phút trong một trận đấu bóng đá điển hình cộng với một

words.defineEn: the number 66; the number of players on six soccer teams
words.defineVi: con số 66; số lượng cầu thủ trong sáu đội bóng đá

words.defineEn: of the number 100; the number of years in a century
words.defineVi: của số 100; số năm trong một thế kỷ

words.defineEn: of the number 1000; the number of meters in one kilometer
words.defineVi: của số 1000; số mét trong một km

examples: Their last album sold millions.
Her last book sold millions of copies.
Millions of people followed the trial on TV.
The disease wiped out 40 million rabbits at a stroke.
Her work has given pleasure to millions of readers.
The grounds covered eight acres.
The government has created eight new peers.
Eight people were held hostage for four months.
The recipe called for eight ounces of flour, which is about one cup.
I usually sleep for eight hours every night.
words.defineEn: the number 8; the number of legs on a spider
words.defineVi: số 8; số lượng chân trên một con nhện

examples: Take two from ten.
The clock says ten past two.
The soccer team has ten players on the field at a time.
He got ten years for armed robbery.
Your plane leaves in ten minutes.
words.defineEn: the number 10; the number of fingers we have on both hands
words.defineVi: số 10; số ngón tay chúng ta có trên cả hai bàn tay

examples: My son reads twelve pages of his book every day.
There are twelve hours on a standard clock.
The year is divided into twelve months, with each month having its own unique characteristics.
She was not good at math, so she thought twelve plus five was seventeen, while it was actually seventeen.
Twelve is dodec-.
words.defineEn: the number 12; the number of months in a year
words.defineVi: số 12; số tháng trong một năm

examples: And in their place, she’ll have THIRTY-TWO bigger, stronger grown-up teeth!
words.defineEn: of the number 32; the number of pieces in a game of chess
words.defineVi: của số 32; số quân cờ trong một ván cờ vua

examples: The speed limit on this road is sixty kilometers per hour.
Alex's genetics make him prone to premature aging, and he often looks like he's on the wrong side of sixty, even though he's in his fifties.
The three German brands, BMW, Mercedes and Audi have historically controlled sixty percent of that market.
Sixty percent of New Zealand's wool goes to China.
Sixty years ago, air travel was far too expensive for the masses.
words.defineEn: the number 60; the number of fingers and toes that three people have
words.defineVi: số 60; số ngón tay và ngón chân mà ba người có

words.defineEn: of the number 76; the number of legs on seven crabs plus six
words.defineVi: của số 76; số chân của bảy con cua cộng với sáu

words.defineEn: the number 99; the number of players on nine soccer teams
words.defineVi: con số 99; số lượng cầu thủ trong chín đội bóng đá

examples: She has sixteen unread messages in her inbox.
There are sixteen chairs in the conference room.
At the age of sixteen he left home.
And I'm sixteen.
Sixteen is hexadec-.
words.defineEn: the number 16; the number of pieces each side has in a game of chess
words.defineVi: số 16; số quân mỗi bên có trong một ván cờ vua

examples: The compass needle always points north.
The problem has now reached crisis point.
I take your point.
No point in spoiling the ship for a ha'porth of tar
The line cuts the circle at two points.
words.defineEn: the punctuation mark . used to indicate that a sentence or an abbreviation is ended
words.defineVi: dấu câu. được sử dụng để chỉ ra rằng một câu hoặc một từ viết tắt đã kết thúc
